import React, {useState,useContext} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { GlobalState } from "../../../GlobalState" import "./CreateProduct.css" const initialState ={ product_id:'', title:'', price:0, description:'hehe =))))', content:'hihi =))))', category:'' } function CreateProduct() { const[product,setProduct] = useState(initialState) const state= useContext(GlobalState) const [categories]=state.categoriesAPI.categories const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const [images, setImages] = useState(false) const styleUpload ={ display: images ? 'block' : 'none' } const handleUpload = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { if(!isAdmin) return alert("You are not an Admin") const file=e.target.files[0] console.log(file) } catch (err) { alert(err.response.data.msg) } } return (
